price: Ким сабр қилиб, кечириб юборса, бас, бу мардона ишлардандир.
arabic: وَلَمَن صَبَرَ وَغَفَرَ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمِنۡ عَزۡمِ ٱلۡأُمُورِ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaman ṣabara waghafara inna dhālika lamin ʿazmi al-umūri
